page.title: 07Walberton_Holiday Club
page.content: The annual week's holiday club for children is run by our two churches. About 40 helpers were directly involved and we registered a record 230 children this year! We took the theme of AIRLINES AND FLYING. The children loved it especially the Fancy Dress parade. On the first morning the children received a "passport" containing a Gospel of St John and a "traveller's chaque" redeemable in the "duty free shop". During the week by various means this was added to and all bought items of their choice. Friday was the highlight when an airhostess came in uniform to serve sundaes and give B.A. presents. The occasion of the special family service at the end of the week again saw St Mary's packed to capacity. A good week!
